column4: so i was thinking of adding a batch file that runs on startup to automatilcy add them
the commands in /etc/rc.local are executed when the computer boots up (before you even login), so you can put stuff there
so what? i just add the location of my bash file there and it will automaticly executed?
You can put the contents of the bash file into rc.local , or add to rc.local: /path/to/bash/file .
